build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev && composer dump-autoload && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; cp .env.railway .env || cp .env.railway.postgres.example .env; php artisan key:generate --force || true; composer dump-autoload -o; echo Waiting for Postgres $DB_HOST:$DB_PORT ...; for i in $(seq 1 40); do (echo > /dev/tcp/$DB_HOST/$DB_PORT) >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo DB port open && break || echo wait...; sleep 2; done; if [ $i -eq 40 ]; then echo Postgres not reachable; exit 1; fi; php artisan migrate --force --no-interaction; php artisan db:seed --force --no-interaction; php artisan config:cache; php artisan route:cache; php artisan view:cache; php artisan optimize:clear; php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT'
